discover_potential: Discover the potential of rainwater harvesting at your location. Start your journey towards sustainable water management and contribute to groundwater conservation.
loc_find_location_p: Provide your location manually, select it on the interactive map, or use GPS for precise assessment.
loc_map_p: Click on the map or drag the marker to set location
data_property_p: Help us provide accurate recommendations by sharing details about your property and requirements.
data_use_label: Primary Intended Use of Harvested Water
data_open_area_small: Include yard, garden, unused land area
data_storage_label: No. of Months of Water Storage Desired
aware_subtitle: Every drop counts in our mission to preserve water for future generations. Learn how rainwater harvesting can transform your property into a water-positive asset.
aware_benefit1_text: Reduce groundwater depletion and support ecosystem sustainability
aware_benefit2_text: Significant reduction in water bills and long-term financial benefits
aware_benefit3_text: Increase your property value with sustainable infrastructure
aware_fact1: A 1000 sq ft roof can collect ~600 liters per inch of rainfall
aware_fact2: Rainwater harvesting can recharge groundwater by 40-60%
aware_fact3: ROI typically achieved within 3-5 years of installation
aware_fact4: Reduces flood risk and urban heat island effect
aware_consent1: I consent to the collection and processing of my location data to provide personalized rainwater harvesting assessments
aware_consent2: I agree to receive updates and recommendations about water conservation initiatives (optional)
aware_consent3: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
subsidy_subtitle: Check your eligibility for rainwater harvesting subsidies and local regulations.
next_steps_text1: Contact your local municipal office to confirm specific local-level incentives or rebates on property tax.
next_steps_text2: Visit the official Jal Shakti Abhiyan website for more information on the nationwide campaign.
warning_text: Non-compliance with mandatory rainwater harvesting regulations may result in penalties, including fines. Make sure your building plans include a rainwater harvesting system to avoid issues during the inspection process.
